page.title: 07INDUSTRIAL AREAS NEAR WALES
page.content: In{Wales}and{Killamarsh}we have three industrial estates serving many different industries. There are many metal engineering firms, storage warehouses and motor repair centres. There is a big food processing firm which makes soup, potted meats and other canned meat products.There is a big firm which produces cereal based foodstuffs for farm animals. Other firms are involved in the construction industry, office equipment and computers. Part of the industrial estate in Wales consists of old colliery buildings.Pump manufacturers, home insulation firms and tyre manufacturing companies also have sites here.Industrial estates have provided employment for many people but they are quiet, eerie and deserted areas with hardly a person to be seen on the streets.
